main.name: Dhananjay Soneji
main.description: currently working as a freelancer where I push pixels, shuffle data, and slap my keyboard until everything works.
main.bio: I'm a graduate student from Gujarat Technological University, India, and currently working as a Freelancer in the USA. Mobile application developer with experience in Native Android Development using Java and React Native for Cross-Platform Application Development. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. Outside of work, I am a Rubik Cube solver 2 x 2, 3 x 3, pyramid and trying to solve ghost cube, Call of Duty player, and Movie/Music lover. I have dreamed of being able to take my work with me while traveling the world.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over.

education.description: After the completion of High School, I transferred to the Gujarat Technological University. I took my Bachelor of Computer Engineering and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (mobile).

work.title: MERN Stack Developer
work.description: Currently, I am working as a freelancer and applying for a full-time job in the USA. Meanwhile, I am working on an e-commerce Virtual Jewelry cross-platform mobile application for one of my clients. I have implemented various features, including AR(Augmented Reality), Products list, Favorite lists, and many more features as a part of Individual Developer. In addition, handling client calls to ensure the requirements of application.

work.title: React Native + Android Developer
work.description: After converting as a full-time employee, I started working on different types of native android and cross-platform mobile applications. I have implemented various features including Music Service, Push Notifications, Background Location Services, Geo-Fencing, Payment Integration, and many more as a part of the Agile team. Manage offshore team and handle handover calls to ensure a smooth transition of tasks. I also get experience working as a team leader in one of my projects. I was a part of this team for 2 years.

work.title: Android Developer Intern
work.description: This company was a startup and I have been invited to be a small but talented team. here I got a chance to explore myself by creating different types of small mobile applications in android as a learning purpose. I was blessed with the most knowledgeable persons on the team, who were always there to help out and to teach me new things.

testimonials.text: It was really nice working with Dhananjay, a good junior and a great friend. A person who takes challenges and is capable of accomplishing that. It was nice to have a positive attitude colleague like him in a team.
testimonials.user: Jaina Trivedi - Fullstack Web Developer at QriousTech Team LLP

testimonials.text: Dhananjay is a person everyone desire to have in their team. I got the chance to work with him, and it was really amazing. I didnâ€™t have to worry about his tasks. If any task is assigned to him i can consider it perfectly done. optimization and innovative thinking are his best qualities. he is a fast learner as he can learn any new thing in very short time.
testimonials.user: Ashotosh Jani - Sr React Native Developer at QriousTech Team LLP
